about.title: About Gadgetify
about.subtitle: Your trusted destination for the latest tech gadgets and innovations
about.missionText: At Gadgetify, we are dedicated to bringing the latest technology to everyone. We believe in providing high-quality products at competitive prices with exceptional customer service. Our goal is to make cutting-edge technology accessible to all and help our customers stay connected in this fast-paced digital world.
about.storyPart1: Founded in 2015, Gadgetify started as a small online store with a passion for technology and innovation. What began as a modest selection of smartphone accessories has grown into a comprehensive tech marketplace offering everything from smartphones and laptops to smart home devices and wearables.
about.storyPart2: Our journey has been defined by our commitment to quality and customer satisfaction. We carefully curate our product selection, partnering with leading brands and emerging innovators to bring you the best technology has to offer.
about.storyPart3: Today, we serve customers nationwide with fast shipping, competitive prices, and dedicated customer support. As technology continues to evolve, we remain committed to being your trusted destination for all things tech.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Have a question or need assistance? We're here to help!
contact.name: Your Name
contact.subject: Subject
contact.formSuccess: Your message has been sent! We'll get back to you soon.
contact.formError: There was an error submitting your message. Please try again.
contact.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
contact.faq1Answer: Standard shipping typically takes 3-5 business days. Express shipping options are available at checkout for faster delivery times.
contact.faq2Answer: We offer a 30-day return policy for most products. Items must be in original condition with all packaging. Some products may have specific return conditions.
contact.faq3Answer: Yes, we ship to most countries worldwide. International shipping rates and delivery times vary by location. These options will be calculated at checkout.
contact.faq4Title: How can I track my order?
contact.faq4Answer: Once your order ships, you will receive a confirmation email with tracking information. You can also track your order through your account dashboard.

chatbot.title: Virtual Assistant
chatbot.welcomeMessage: Hello! How can I help you?
chatbot.accuracyWarning: AI may provide inaccurate or misleading information
chatbot.errorWarning: AI may encounter errors or not work as expected
chatbot.dataClearing: Chat history will be deleted when the page is reloaded or browser is closed
chatbot.saveImportantInfo: Please copy important information before leaving the page
chatbot.connectionError: An error occurred while connecting to Gemini.
chatbot.systemPrompt1: You are a helpful virtual assistant for the Gadgetify electronics and technology accessories website. Please help me answer questions related to shopping on the website.
chatbot.systemPrompt2: Regarding the shopping process on the website, users must log in or register an account, or can also log in with Google. After logging in, you can add products you want to buy to your shopping cart, then proceed to place an order. You can also buy products immediately without adding them to the cart. When placing an order, you can choose discount vouchers. The website currently supports payment by bank transfer and cash on delivery. If you choose bank transfer, after successful transfer, the order will be moved to pending confirmation status. While waiting for confirmation, you can still cancel the order and get a refund. You will not be able to cancel the order once it has been confirmed.
chatbot.systemPrompt3: Please answer briefly but clearly. For questions not related to the website or shopping on the website, please respond that you cannot help. Ensure that the response content only contains plain text, no markdown.
chatbot.systemPrompt4: If customers ask questions related to products or categories, please respond based on the following data:
chatbot.systemPrompt5: Product links have the following format: http://localhost:5173/category-name/product-name/product-id
chatbot.systemPrompt6: If customers need advice or want to buy a product, ask the customer which product they want to buy, then provide detailed information about that product, you can search for more information on the internet if necessary.
